title: Nelson DeMille: "The Cuban Affair"
description: Bestselling author Nelson DeMille, who has been a guest of Michael's many times over the years, today on his book "The Cuban Affair: A Novel." Original air date 20 September 2017. The book was published on 19 September 2017.
author: podcasts@siriusxm.com (Michael Smerconish, Nelson DeMille)
